name: Misadventure #5: Naked Nightmare
overview: Naked Nightmare is the fifth in a series of adult-oriented text adventures for the TRS-80. The player wakes up naked and alone in a building of twisting passageways. They must escape the building before time runs out and the building explodes. The player must explore the twisting halls to find a series of buttons to deactivate a laser defense system. They can then flag down a helicopter and escape to safety. All commands are via VERB NOUN entry, and there is no save/restore option.
